    IgnoreUnknownParser
    Parser override to ignore unknown options.
    PosixParserRequiredProps
    An extension to the base PosixParser that allows 'required' arguments to be passed in a properties file as well as the command line.

    Runs annotated tools.
    RunJob.DriverMeta
    Driver/Tool meta information
    ToolContext
    Base context for a MapReduce Application/Tool
    ToolContextBase
    A base class for annotated tool contexts that includes the properties found in the concrete ToolContext class.
